villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with Ammo Carts.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo
resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 wood and +1 ore each day.

special1.name: Escape Tunnel
special1.description: The Escape Tunnel allows a garrison hero to flee from defending against a siege.

special2.name: Freelancer's Guild
special2.description: The Freelancer's Guild allows you to trade creatures for resources.

special3.name: Ballista Yard
special3.description: This Blacksmith upgrade provides your armies with ballistas.

special4.name: Hall of Valhalla
special4.description: The Hall of Valhalla increases the Attack skill of any visiting hero by +1.

horde1.name: Mess Hall
horde1.description: The Mess Hall increases Goblin production by 8 per week.

horde1Upgr.name: Mess Hall
horde1Upgr.description: The Mess Hall increases Hobgoblin production by 8 per week.

grail.name: Warlords' Monument
grail.description: The presence of the Warlords' Monument increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, and increases the Attack strength of a garrison hero by +20 when defending against a siege.

mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1
mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2
mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3
mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

dwellingLvl1.name: Goblin Barracks
dwellingLvl1.description: The Goblin Barracks allow you to recruit Goblins.

dwellingLvl2.name: Wolf Pen
dwellingLvl2.description: The Wolf Pen allows you to recruit Wolf Riders.

dwellingLvl3.name: Orc Tower
dwellingLvl3.description: The Orc Tower allows you to recruit Orcs.

dwellingLvl4.name: Ogre Fort
dwellingLvl4.description: The Ogre Fort allows you to recruit Ogres.

dwellingLvl5.name: Cliff Nest
dwellingLvl5.description: The Cliff Nest allows you to recruit Rocs.

dwellingLvl6.name: Cyclops Cave
dwellingLvl6.description: The Cyclops Cave allows you to recruit Cyclopses.

dwellingLvl7.name: Behemoth Lair
dwellingLvl7.description: The Behemoth Lair allows you to recruit Behemoths.

dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Goblin Barracks
dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Goblin Barracks allow you to recruit Hobgoblins.

dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Wolf Pen
dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Wolf Pen allows you to recruit Wolf Raiders.

dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Orc Tower
dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Orc Tower allows you to recruit Orc Chieftains.

dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Ogre Fort
dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Ogre Fort allows you to recruit Ogre Magi.

dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Cliff Nest
dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Cliff Nest allows you to recruit Thunderbirds.

dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Cyclops Cave
dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Cyclops Cave allows you to recruit Cyclops Kings.

dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Behemoth Lair
dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Behemoth Lair allows you to recruit Ancient Behemoths.
